description:
Registered criminal offences

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
24911 Police crime statistics

Definition:
The criminal offences registered and cleared up and the
suspects identified by the police are registered in the
police crime statistics of the Federal Criminal Police
Office. These statistics show all crimes and offences,
except for those against state security and road traffic
offences, to the extent that they were registered by the
police.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Registered criminal offences
